name: PewPewPew DEFENDOR 2
description:
OH NO! Aliens are spotted outside your base! Go defend, DEFENDOR!

WASD to move ship

Mouse button 1 - default PewPew

Mouse button 2 - flame-thrower

Q - ability 1 - shield

E - ability 2 - Angel of Death missiles

R - acquire targets (press before using E to make your missiles homing)

SPACE - force drawing cards (up to 5, just 1 card is implemented atm)

TAB - open the card view

SHIFT - change between Use (apply card effect), Learn (get card XP), Sell (get card NRG) modes for cards.

Use 1 - 5 with the card tab open to apply the active card mode to cards 1-5.

WARNING: the one card implemented does massive damage to everything on screen :D BOOOM! Use it last.
